verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> vay-Hi came כִּשְׁמֹ֖עַ <WH8085> kish-Mo-a' had heard יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> ya-Vin And it came to pass when Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king חָצ֑וֹר <WH2674> cha-Tzor; of Hazor וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach, [those things] that he sent אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹבָב֙ <WH3103> yo-Vav to Jobab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king מָד֔וֹן <WH4068> ma-Don, of Madon וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech and to the king שִׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8110> shim-Ron of Shimron וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech and to the king אַכְשָֽׁף׃ <WH407> 'ach-Shaf. of Achshaph

וְֽאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to הַמְּלָכִ֞ים <WH4428> ham-me-la-Chim And to the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who מִצְּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fon, that [were] on the north בָּהָ֧ר <WH2022> ba-Har of the mountains וּבָעֲרָבָ֛ה <WH6160> u-va-'a-ra-Vah and of the plains נֶ֥גֶב <WH5045> Ne-gev south כִּֽנֲר֖וֹת <WH3672> ki-na-Rot of Chinneroth וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֑ה <WH8219> u-vash-she-fe-Lah; and in the valley וּבְנָפ֥וֹת <WH5299> u-ve-na-Fot and in the borders דּ֖וֹר <WH1756> Dor of Dor מִיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> mi-Yam. on the west

הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni [And to] the Canaanite מִמִּזְרָ֣ח <WH4217> mi-miz-Rach on the east וּמִיָּ֔ם <WH3220> u-mi-Yam, and on the west וְהָאֱמֹרִ֧י <WH567> ve-ha-'e-mo-Ri and [to] the Amorite וְהַחִתִּ֛י <WH2850> ve-ha-chit-Ti and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֥י <WH6522> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi and the Perizzite וְהַיְבוּסִ֖י <WH2983> ve-hay-vu-Si and the Jebusite בָּהָ֑ר <WH2022> ba-Har; in the mountains וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <WH2340> ve-ha-chiv-Vi and [to] the Hivite תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat the foot חֶרְמ֔וֹן <WH2768> cher-Mon, under Hermon בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> ham-mitz-Pah. of Mizpeh

וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> vai-ye-tze-'U And they went out הֵ֗ם <WH1992> Hem, they וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <WH4264> ma-cha-nei-Hem they and all their hosts עִמָּ֔ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam, with עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people רָ֕ב <WH7227> rav with them much כַּח֛וֹל <WH2344> ka-Chol even as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> se-fat- shore הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam that [is] upon the sea לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> la-Ro; in multitude וְס֥וּס <WH5483> ve-Sus with horses וָרֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> va-Re-chev and chariots רַב־ <WH7227> rav- many מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. very
